location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 8428/49 'Foreign Office Lists: representatives of foreign states and commonwealth governments in London'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 133; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file contains a series of booklets that are lists of permanent and temporary officers of the British Foreign Service at consular posts, but also those of representatives of foreign states and commonwealth countries in London. The lists are organised by country, include most dignitaries, officers, and attaches of the respective country's diplomatic mission, and cover the years 1948 and 1949.
